title: What It’s Like Riding up El Sifón, the Longest Paved Climb in the World
content:
What riding up El Sifón, a winding road through the Andes Mountains, teaches us about cycling in Colombia.

Read the full article at What It’s Like Riding up El Sifón, the Longest Paved Climb in the World on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
